remarks:
Composition of two functions expressed as ordered-pair class abstractions.  If ` F ` has the equation ` ( x + 2 ) ` and ` G ` the equation ` ( 3 * z ) ` then ` ( G o. F ) ` has the equation ` ( 3 * ( x + 2 ) ) ` .  (Contributed by FL, 21-Jun-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.) 

---

 Composition of two functions expressed as ordered-pair class abstractions.  If ` F ` has the equation ( x + 2 ) and ` G ` the equation ( 3 * z ) then ` ( G o. F ) ` has the equation ( 3 * ( x + 2 ) ) .  (Contributed by FL, 21-Jun-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
